intent_template: Add {{quantity}} of {{item}} from this page to my shopping cart.
intent: Add 72 cans of the purple energy drink from this page to my shopping cart.

program_html.locator: lambda:(() => {try {return Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.item-info')).find(el => el.textContent.includes('V8 +Energy, Healthy Energy Drink, Steady Energy from Black and Green Tea, Pomegranate Blueberry, 8 Ounce Can ,Pack of 24')).querySelector('input').getAttribute('data-item-qty')} catch (e) {return ' '}})()
